inclusion.criterion: Delivery of a live-born infant with gestational age < 36 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Informed and written consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of dysmenorrhea, menorrhagia or coagulopathies
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prolonged rupture of membranes <24 hours with or without chorioamnionitis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of current, recent (within previous 3 months) or recurrent pelvic inflammatory diseases (PID)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 54-year-old woman with abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion and HPV 16 positivity. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
